content: George O'Hara has marked this topic as resolved.

Is Zulip mostly for development on Rust itself, or is it intended for discussing how to use Rust as well?
I'm looking for an instant chat platform where I can ask questions when using Rust. I saw another option is Discord, which seems to have a "rust-usage" and a "beginner" channel. But I don't really like Discord.
Nobody will be upset if you ask on Zulip, but you'd get better/more/faster answers on Discord
